data.text: @WalesOnline @Willhaycardiff still has a covid book to sell.....

@WalesOnline Will Hayward, really, no gives a damn... you are  desperately scraping barrells for relevance now that tongueing Drakeford no longer works. Never mind, you can go back to beating yr sad indy drum with all the other irrelevant 'welsh' media sycophants.

@steveburnley @WalesOnline No he said it wasn't a race - then immediately started comparing Wales with England. Only used figures to score political points, look at the rate of vaccination he would shout, except he missed out the part where England were vaccinating in a day what Wales did in a month

@WalesOnline You missed hospital and care home visits off the list again. Drakeford better remove those too or produce evidence that they actually do something. Remember that most patients in hospital WITH covid caught it while they were there so where's the science ?
@WalesOnline Shut up Willy warmer! The hoax was out a long time ago,catch up ffs! #mediascum
@WalesOnline Why are the isolation rules different for the unjabbed when both jabbed & unjabbed can spread Covid @PrifWeinidog
@WalesOnline When they say it's a marathon and not a sprint, auld Dripford is an extreme marathon runner at this point - metaphorically speaking of course
